channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Buffalo Bills QB Josh Allen lists $8.5 million SoCal mansion after marrying actress Hailee Steinfeld
item.description: NFL star Josh Allen is selling his California bachelor pad for $8.5 million, just weeks after he and actress Hailee Steinfeld tied the knot.

item.title: Renault shares dive after French automaker issues profit warning
item.description: Renault shares fell 16% on Wednesday after the French automaker issued a profit warning that will lead to job cuts.

item.title: ASML shares slide as chip-equipment giant says sales might not grow at all next year
item.description: ASML shares skidded on Wednesday after the microchip equipment maker warned sales might not grow at all next year.

item.title: Country music star Ella Langley buys a lakefront retreat in Alabama
item.description: Country icon Ella Langley has bought her first-ever home in the form of a lakefront retreat near her hometown of Montgomery, Alabama.

item.title: My daughter has $500K in med-school expenses. Can my wife and I afford to pay it off?
item.description: “Our annual income is $140,000. We are both on Medicare.”

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
